== Mattannur (M) (803261) ==

Mattannur (M) is a town in the [[Thalassery]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 54.32 sq. km. and harbouring 9788 households with total population of 47078 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 27 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 539 km. Male population is 22658 and female population is 24420. Scheduled Caste population is 945 and Scheduled Tribes population is 132. Census Location Code of the town is 803261<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 82 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 96 km. Railway station is at Thalassery at a distance of 21 km.
